docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman v2 is stable and recommended for use. You may use v2 by either passing ‘version=2’ in the Accept Header or using api/v2/ in the URL.

methods.name: create
methods.full_description: The name field is used for the name of the realm.

params.name: realm_type
params.description: Realm type, e.g. FreeIPA or Active Directory
